sentences.cn: 你们有文具出售 吗 ?

sentences.en: He's been helping himself to my stationery.
sentences.cn: 他未经许可一直用我的文具.

sentences.en: I loved stationery and all the accoutrements of writing.
sentences.cn: 我喜爱信笺信封和所有文房用具。

sentences.en: I walk to go to buy a rule into the stationery shop.
sentences.cn: 我走进文具店去买一把尺子.

sentences.en: If you step across to the shop, you will be able to buy the stationery you need.
sentences.cn: 你要是到附近那家商店去一下, 就能买到你需要的文具.
米勒到各地去推销办公用品.

sentences.en: She has bought paper, pens, and other such stationery.
sentences.cn: 她买了纸 、 笔以及诸如此类的文具.

sentences.en: She works in the stationery department of a big store.
sentences.cn: 她在一家大商店的文具部工作.

sentences.en: Stationery can be imprinted with your message or logo.
sentences.cn: 可以把你的信息或标志印在信纸上。

sentences.en: stationery embossed with the hotel's name
sentences.cn: 凸印旅馆名称的信笺和信封

sentences.en: The ink should be next to the paper clips and thumbtacks in the stationery section, sir.
sentences.cn: 墨水应该在文具部的回形针和图钉旁边, 先生.

sentences.en: There was something very comfortable in having plenty of stationery.
sentences.cn: 文具一多,心里自会觉得踏实.

sentences.en: Was the note written on hotel stationery?
sentences.cn: 便条是用饭店的便笺写的 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can buy ready-printed forms for wills at stationery shops.
sentences.cn: 你可以在文具店买到已印好的遗嘱单。

sentences.en: You don't need to pull out your stationery.

trans.tran_cn: 文具，办公用品，信纸，信封，文房四宝
trans.tran_en: paper for writing letters, usually with matching envelopes
